name: part_004
file: tmp_【#白上フブキ生誕LIVE】Congrats Birthday FOX【ホロライブ⧸白上フブキ】 [7Vs-5Rwu8ks]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Kami no Mani Mani'.
MC section between songs where the performers talk to the audience.
Transition sequence with graphics and character clips.
Performance of the song 'Nippon Egao Hyakkei'.

subtitles.original: 神のまにまに
subtitles.english: Kami no Mani Mani (At the Mercy of the Gods)

subtitles.original: 自意識は回ってる
subtitles.english: Self-consciousness is turning

subtitles.original: 泥んこだけど歩いて行こう
subtitles.english: I'm covered in mud, but let's keep walking

subtitles.original: まだまだ先は長いさ
subtitles.english: There's still a long way to go

subtitles.original: 本当に大事なものなんて
subtitles.english: Things that are truly important

subtitles.original: 意外とくだらないことの中にあるよ
subtitles.english: Are surprisingly found within trivial things

subtitles.original: 時にはみんなでバカ騒ぎ
subtitles.english: Sometimes, let's all make a fuss together

subtitles.original: 裸踊りで大笑い
subtitles.english: Laughing loudly with a naked dance

subtitles.original: 大笑い！
subtitles.english: Loud laughing!

subtitles.original: そうさ 神のまにまに
subtitles.english: That's right, at the mercy of the gods

subtitles.original: 仰せのままに
subtitles.english: As they command

subtitles.original: もっともっと自分を愛せるよ
subtitles.english: You can love yourself more and more

subtitles.original: 鏡を見てごらんよ
subtitles.english: Take a look in the mirror

subtitles.original: もう分かるでしょう
subtitles.english: You probably already know, right?

subtitles.original: みんなを照らす光さ
subtitles.english: You're the light that shines on everyone

subtitles.original: そうさ 神のまにまに
subtitles.english: That's right, at the mercy of the gods

subtitles.original: みんなありがとう
subtitles.english: Thank you everyone

subtitles.original: やっぱり地球を愛してる
subtitles.english: After all, I love the Earth

subtitles.original: 花を咲かそう
subtitles.english: Let the flowers bloom

subtitles.original: 大きな花を
subtitles.english: Big flowers

subtitles.original: 天まで届くくらいの
subtitles.english: High enough to reach the heavens

subtitles.original: はい！ということで！
subtitles.english: Yes! And so!

subtitles.original: はい！ミオと、あやめちゃんです！
subtitles.english: Yes! It's Mio and Ayame-chan!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: ありがとうありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you, thank you!

subtitles.original: 今日誕生日おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Happy birthday today!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！二人ともー！イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Thank you! Both of you! Yay!

subtitles.original: おめでたいね。
subtitles.english: It's a celebratory occasion.

subtitles.original: ということでね、まあ三人といえば百花繚乱なんだけども...
subtitles.english: So, speaking of the three of us, we're Hyakka Ryouran...

subtitles.original: ま、こないだもね、あやめちゃんのあの誕生日...
subtitles.english: Well, just the other day, at Ayame-chan's birthday...

subtitles.original: 誕生日ライブも、そう！周年記念！
subtitles.english: Birthday live, yes! The anniversary!

subtitles.original: 周年記念だ！
subtitles.english: Anniversary!

subtitles.original: そうだそうだ！はい、で踊ったので
subtitles.english: Right, right! Yes, since we danced then

subtitles.original: なんか、三人で別の曲もやってみたいなということで
subtitles.english: We thought we'd like to try another song as a trio

subtitles.original: 神のまにまにを躍らせていただきました！
subtitles.english: So we performed Kami no Mani Mani!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Yay! Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: 和風三人で初めてだよね。
subtitles.english: It's the first time for the three of us with the Japanese theme.

subtitles.original: ねー！いや本当に。
subtitles.english: Right! Yeah, really.

subtitles.original: いいね、やっぱこういう曲歌うのも。
subtitles.english: It's nice, singing this kind of song too.

subtitles.original: たまにはいいですね。
subtitles.english: It's good once in a while.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: 今日ケーキ食べたの？白上は。
subtitles.english: Did you eat cake today, Shirakami?

subtitles.original: ケーキまだ食べてない！
subtitles.english: I haven't eaten cake yet!

subtitles.original: えー！？
subtitles.english: Whaaaat!?

subtitles.original: じゃ、これ終わったらみんなで食べましょう！
subtitles.english: Then let's all eat together after this!

subtitles.original: あー！デカいの食べたい！
subtitles.english: Ah! I want to eat a big one!

subtitles.original: デカいの食べよう！デカいのがいい！
subtitles.english: Let's eat a big one! Big is good!

subtitles.original: ぜひぜひぜひ。このあともね、まだあのコラボのメンバーいますので
subtitles.english: Definitely. After this, there are still collab members...

subtitles.original: それ終わったらみんなでケーキ食べて終わりましょう！
subtitles.english: After that's over, let's all eat cake and finish up!

subtitles.original: やったー！ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Yay! Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: ということで、ミオと、あやめちゃんでした！
subtitles.english: So, it was Mio and Ayame-chan!

subtitles.original: ありがとう！おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you! Congratulations!

subtitles.original: ニッポン笑顔百景
subtitles.english: Nippon Egao Hyakkei (Japan's Hundred Smiling Views)

subtitles.original: よーっ！
subtitles.english: Yoh!

subtitles.original: 寿限無 寿限無 五劫の擦り切れ 海砂利水魚の
subtitles.english: Jugemu Jugemu Gokou no Surikire Kaijarisuigyo no

subtitles.original: 水行末 雲来末 風来末
subtitles.english: Suigyomatsu Unraimatsu Furaimatsu

subtitles.original: 食う寝る処に住む処
subtitles.english: Kuuneru tokoro ni sumu tokoro

subtitles.original: 藪ら柑子の藪柑子
subtitles.english: Yaburakouji no yabukouji

subtitles.original: パイポパイポ パイポのシューリンガン
subtitles.english: Paipo Paipo Paipo no Shuuringan

subtitles.original: シューリンガンのグーリンダイ...
subtitles.english: Shuuringan no Guurindai...

subtitles.original: ちょいと時間頂きます
subtitles.english: Please give me a little time

subtitles.original: ご清聴ください
subtitles.english: Please listen

subtitles.original: 整いました！
subtitles.english: I'm ready!

subtitles.original: 笑うこととかけまして
subtitles.english: Comparing laughing to something...

subtitles.original: お祭り野郎と解きます
subtitles.english: I solve it as a festival-goer...

subtitles.original: その心は、その心は
subtitles.english: The reason is, the reason is...

subtitles.original: どちらもハッピーになるでしょう！
subtitles.english: Both will become happy!

subtitles.original: お後がよろしいようで！
subtitles.english: And that's that!

subtitles.original: 笑おう 笑おう さあ笑いましょう
subtitles.english: Let's laugh, let's laugh, come on let's laugh

subtitles.original: こんな時代こそ笑いましょう
subtitles.english: In times like these especially, let's laugh

subtitles.original: 泣いたって馬鹿だ やけくそ笑いましょう
subtitles.english: It's stupid to cry, let's laugh out of desperation

subtitles.original: 波乱万丈 辛いも甘いも
subtitles.english: Ups and downs, bitter and sweet

subtitles.original: 乗り越えた天晴日本人
subtitles.english: Magnificent Japanese who have overcome

subtitles.original: 笑おう
subtitles.english: Let's laugh

subtitles.original: どんな時でも何糞笑いましょう
subtitles.english: No matter when, let's laugh with all our might

subtitles.original: ハハハハ！ワハハハ！
subtitles.english: Ha ha ha ha! Wa ha ha ha!

subtitles.original: 空気なんて読まずに笑っとけ
subtitles.english: Don't read the room, just keep laughing

subtitles.original: 笑顔！笑顔！
subtitles.english: Smiles! Smiles!

subtitles.original: 笑う門には福来たる！
subtitles.english: Good fortune comes to those who laugh!

subtitles.original: え、皆様、今日はようこそおいで頂きました
subtitles.english: Uh, everyone, welcome and thank you for coming today

subtitles.original: ここで一首！
subtitles.english: Here's a verse!

subtitles.original: ネズミの娘がお嫁に行って
subtitles.english: A mouse's daughter went to be a bride

subtitles.original: じきに帰ってきたんでネズミのお母さんが大変怒って
subtitles.english: And came back soon, so the mouse mother was very angry

subtitles.original: 「あんな良い所へお前嫁いで、誰が嫌で出てきたんだい？」
subtitles.english: "You married into such a good place, who did you dislike and come back?"

subtitles.original: 「いいえ、誰も嫌じゃないんですけれど」
subtitles.english: "No, it's not that I disliked anyone..."
